definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of

sentences.english: The encryption keys are generated and transmitted via a KDM (Key Delivery Message) to the projection site.
sentences.chinese: 密鑰通過KDM生成並傳輸到投影機上。

sentences.english: One on authoring debugger visualizers and two on debugging debugger visualizers.
sentences.chinese: 一對創作調試實物投影機及兩個調試調試插畫。

sentences.english: No problem. Do you need the OHP?
sentences.chinese: 沒問題。你需要投影機嗎？

sentences.english: In the meeting, I want to briefly show my ideas by using the OHP (Over Head Projector).
sentences.chinese: 在這次會議中，我想簡單的用投影機展示我的想法。

sentences.english: The  projector is  subject to rejection and may be ejected from the  project.
sentences.chinese: 投影機有遭到否決的傾向並可能被逐出工程。

sentences.english: Above: Digtal overhead projector's software interface and the projector itself.
sentences.chinese: 以上爲實體投影機的軟體介面與實機。

sentences.english: Where would you find a projector for an 8mm film these days?
sentences.chinese: 你現在還能找到8毫米電影的投影機嗎？

sentences.english: By default, Ignore Layers is none so all geometry that intersects the Projector frustum will be affected.
sentences.chinese: 因此與投影機平截頭體相交的幾何體都會受到影響。

sentences.english: That subsidises the cost of installing digital projectors.
sentences.chinese: 這些降低了安裝數碼投影機的成本。

sentences.english: Projectors are too big and clunky, right?
sentences.chinese: 不過投影機又大又重的，對不對？

sentences.english: UHP Projector lamps are made of borosilicate glass and fused quartz.
sentences.chinese: UHP投影機燈泡由硼硅酸鹽玻璃和熔凝石英制成。

sentences.english: Put your transparency on the projector.
sentences.chinese: 把你的投影片放在投影機上。

sentences.english: projector for your presentation, do not hesitate to contact our Equipment Service.
sentences.chinese: 或打算使用投影機，請與我中心的設備服務部門聯繫。

sentences.english: While the pico projectors allow you to display a virtual keyboard on a tabletop for typing.
sentences.chinese: 微型投影機允許您在桌面上投影一個虛擬鍵盤來打字。

sentences.english: Then I couldn’t get my computer to talk to my projector.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，我的電腦不能讀取投影機設備。
